name: Recollection (Recollection)
description:
After a night of heavy drinking, you find yourself lost in your own mind, unable to remember how you got there. Explore your thoughts and focus your memories to try make sense of what went wrong.

Music and SFX: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsLlqLIE-TqDq3lh5kU2PeA?&ab_channel=HeatleyBros...

Using GhostSprites by GadgetGoggles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/ghost-sprites-2d-40357
